Package gobblin.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HttpClient<RQ,RP>
    An interface to send a request
    ResponseHandler<RQ,RP>
    An interface to handle a response
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApacheHttpAsyncClient
    An asynchronous HttpClient which sends HttpUriRequest and registers a callback.
    ApacheHttpClient
    A synchronous HttpClient that sends HttpUriRequest and gets CloseableHttpResponse.
    ApacheHttpRequest<D>
    A specific AsyncRequest related to a HttpUriRequest and its associated record information
    ApacheHttpRequestBuilder
    Build HttpUriRequest that can talk to http services.
    ApacheHttpResponseHandler<RP extends org.apache.http.HttpResponse>
    Basic logic to handle a HttpResponse from a http service
    ApacheHttpResponseStatus  
    HttpOperation  
    HttpOperation.Builder
    RecordBuilder for HttpOperation instances.
    HttpRequestResponseRecord  
    HttpRequestResponseRecord.Builder
    RecordBuilder for HttpRequestResponseRecord instances.
    ResponseStatus
    This class represents a result of handling a response
    ThrottledHttpClient<RQ,RP>
    A HttpClient for throttling calls to the underlying TX operation using the input Limiter.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ApacheHttpClient.ConnManager  
    StatusType
    Different types of response status
